caption:
This photograph captures a moment on a fishing boat, featuring two individuals engaging in marine activities. The setting is an expansive body of water, likely a sea or ocean, under a clear blue sky. The calmness of the water suggests good weather conditions.

On the left side of the image, there is a male figure dressed in a plaid shirt and dark trousers, complete with rubber boots, suggesting he is prepared for wet conditions. He appears to be inspecting or working on a part of the boat, next to a small, cabin-like structure that forms part of the boatâ€™s deck. The cabin is modest, constructed from wood and simple materials, and holds various items like a jacket hanging off it.

On the right, another figure, possibly female due to the presence of a blue sweater and striped pants, stands facing the water, handling a large, circular fish trap which is being lifted out of the water. The trap is made of a metallic frame and netting, designed to capture seafood such as crabs or lobsters.

The background reveals a hint of a distant shoreline, suggesting this fishing activity is not far from land. The entirety of the composition reflects a working day on the water, capturing both the effort involved in marine fishing and the serene setting in which it occurs.
title: Jack wiegardt and denis hickey harvesting dungeness crabs
